oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Children with nurse in front of Beechland
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beechland in Cages Bend, near Gallatin, Tennessee. The white-sided home is partially obscured by trees. A white fence runs the length of the photograph. Polly Shute, the nurse, stands with her hands on her hips. Two young girls, Janie and Emma, stand in the forefront. Frank Anderson, wearing a hat, is leaning on the fence in the background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
